This book is a collection of notes and exercieses for the textbook "Adaptive Moving Mesh Methods" [@huang2011] with Julia Implementation.  The source code of the book can be found at [MMPDELab](https://whuang.ku.edu/MMPDElab/mmpdelabv1.html) in Matlab.
